'''Radiant Spincrystal 78''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Whirling of Leaves and Petals]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the roof of the [[Citadel of Regzar]].
